verbs.description: INDIANAPOLIS , Ind.-- [ARG0: Indiana 's three Republican U.S. Senate candidates] [V: kept] up [ARG1: their TV advertising attack lines] [ARG2: against each other] [ARGM-TMP: during their final televised debate before next week 's primary] . Mike Braun , Luke Messer and Todd Rokita largely focused their remarks during Monday evening 's debate on casting doubt about the support of the other candidates for President Donald Trump .
